```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
setwd(".")
library(sqldf)
library(xtable)
```

## Load the MOP datasets

```{r load}
bench04mop_apacheds <- read.csv("MOP-apacheds-kerberos-codec.csv", head=T, sep=",")
bench04mop_artemis <- read.csv("MOP-artemis-commons.csv", head=T, sep=",")
bench04mop_deltaspike <- read.csv("MOP-deltaspike-core-impl.csv", head=T, sep=",")
bench04mop_meecrowave <- read.csv("MOP-meecrowave-core.csv", head=T, sep=",")
bench04mop_spark <- read.csv("MOP-spark-core_2.11.csv", head=T, sep=",")
bench04mop_wicket <- read.csv("MOP-wicket-util.csv", head=T, sep=",")

# "spec"      "error"     "class"     "className" "method"
colnames(bench04mop_apacheds)
nrow(sqldf("select distinct className, method, error from bench04mop_apacheds"))
nrow(sqldf("select distinct className, method, error from bench04mop_artemis"))
nrow(sqldf("select distinct className, method, error from bench04mop_deltaspike")) 
nrow(sqldf("select distinct className, method, error from bench04mop_meecrowave"))
nrow(sqldf("select distinct className, method, error from bench04mop_spark"))
nrow(sqldf("select distinct className, method, error from bench04mop_wicket"))
```

## Load the CC datasets

```{r loadcc}
bench04cc_apacheds <- read.csv("CogniCrypt-apacheds-kerberos-codec.csv", head=T, sep=",")
bench04cc_artemis <- read.csv("CogniCrypt-artemis-commons.csv", head=T, sep=",")
bench04cc_deltaspike <- read.csv("CogniCrypt-deltaspike-core-impl.csv", head=T, sep=",")
bench04cc_meecrowave <- read.csv("CogniCrypt-meecrowave-core.csv", head=T, sep=",")
bench04cc_spark <- read.csv("CogniCrypt-spark-core_2.11.csv", head=T, sep=",")
bench04cc_wicket <- read.csv("CogniCrypt-wicket-util.csv", head=T, sep=",")

nrow(bench04cc_apacheds)
nrow(bench04cc_artemis)
nrow(bench04cc_deltaspike)
nrow(bench04cc_meecrowave)
nrow(bench04cc_spark)
nrow(bench04cc_wicket)
```
